ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/8/99 7:09:26 AM Eastern Standard Time, kayntwhyle@uswest.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/8/99 7:09:26 AM Eastern Standard Time,
kayntwhyle@... writes:

<<
A somewhat tedious but still lucrative method involves Polar Bear Cloaks.
You can make these for 5 plat each in Everfrost, and they will sell for
10-15 on Faydwer... possibly more these days.

Involves travel and some work, but quite a lot of money can be made by doing
this.

Alternatively, you are close to Wisp time.... Greater Lightstones will get
you almost ten plat each, and they aren't terribly hard to find. :)
>>

I'm not sure Polar Bear cloaks are the way to go. Karg Icebear is very hard
to find these days as so many people are killing him (not like the old days
when you could always find him wandering around).

Here is my newbie money raising secret. Collect Batwings. Sell them in
batches of 20. Many higher lvl Wizards will pay 10pp or more for a batch of
20 wings cause we don't want to bother hunting bats.
